law.history: Repealed 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 108, sec. 18. -- Amended 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 12. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 47, sec. 9. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2711a-187.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Pay at encampments or other exercises.
